title: Bug 116564 - Hyperlink builder title changes incorrectly
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the title of the hyperlink builder changes to 'www.actuate.com' instead of 'Hyperlink Options'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as 'Hyperlink Options' even after reopening it.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the hyperlink builder. 2. Make changes if necessary. 3. Click on 'OK' to close the hyperlink builder. 4. Reopen the hyperlink builder and observe the title change.
